channel.title: Help please small problem but need help with java reward earns an admin on sever
channel.description:
ok so i have a problem and i just got a new pc and i downloaded java and tryed to run a client doesnt work, then try to run a server says the same thing for the client as well. im thinking that it has something to do with java and if someone could help me then i promice when i run a server ill make u an admin. HERES A PIC OF THE PROBLEM- please try to make a cycle of wut my problem is thank you here u go.
[IMG]http://i469.photobucket.com/albums/rr57/lakai445/clientprob.jpg[/img]

item.title: Help please small problem but need help with java reward earns an admin on sever
item.dc:creator: @Helixian Helixian
item.description:
@Helixian wrote:

kk for variables, add::
C:\Program Files x(86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin

sorry, i cant remember the other =/

then for your compilers, make sure it has 1.6.0, no other versions and it will work

item.title: Help please small problem but need help with java reward earns an admin on sever
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

start>right click computer>properties>advanced settings>enviorment variables>under user variables click new>name=path and for variable put C:\Program Files x(86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin or whatever your java is

hope this helped

Read full topic
